TEXT.TITLE: U.S. BUSINESS LOANS FALL 618 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: Business loans on the books of major U.S. banks, excluding acceptances, fell 618 mln dlrs to 278.88 billion dlrs in the week ended February 25, the Federal Reserve Board said. The Fed said that business loans including acceptances fell 897 mln dlrs to 281.23 billion dlrs. Reuter
